title: How to reduce Ping?
body:
Ok so here it goes, i want to play on NA, im tired of playing on LAN servers, the problem here is that even tought i am geographically closer to NA servers, get 30 ms more than on LAN, but it's weird since i just get those 30 extra ms at certain hours, (night), while on the evening i get 10 ms less than on LAN servers, anyone know why this happens, and if there's a way to fix it?
PS. it's not my connection since on LAN servers i always get 48 ms, and i mean  like every second of the game.

replies.body: Ping issues can certainly be caused by the physical distance between you and a server, but there's usually other factors like local network issues.  I recommend starting out with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and going through each step to make sure that everything is in order.  I have a feeling that will do the trick!
